name: A PICTURE OF INNOCENCE
overview: Set in a magical art gallery with pictures that you are able to enter. In them you must find the missing Dr. Forbes and his kidnapper. As you explore the pictures you find a multitude of individual problems, some of which will provide you with clues to the missing doctor's whereabouts. You encounter variety of characters different settings. Eventually you corner the villain in his mansion. Steady though, or he could have the last laugh.
